TechnologyPositions.title: Medical Technologist
TechnologyPositions.description: Operates advanced diagnostic and treatment equipment in healthcare settings.

TechnologyPositions.title: Biomedical Engineer
TechnologyPositions.description: Designs and develops medical devices, equipment, and software.

TechnologyPositions.title: Clinical Informatics Specialist
TechnologyPositions.description: Manages and analyzes healthcare data and develops technology solutions for clinical environments.

TechnologyPositions.title: Telemedicine Specialist
TechnologyPositions.description: Utilizes technology to provide remote healthcare services.

GeneralPractitioner.title: General Practitioner (GP)
GeneralPractitioner.description: Provides primary care, diagnoses illnesses, and recommends treatments.

SpecialistDoctors.title: Cardiologist
SpecialistDoctors.description: Specializes in diagnosing and treating heart-related conditions.

SpecialistDoctors.title: Neurologist
SpecialistDoctors.description: Focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of neurological disorders.

SpecialistDoctors.title: Pediatrician
SpecialistDoctors.description: Specializes in the care and treatment of infants, children, and adolescents.

SpecialistDoctors.title: Orthopedic Surgeon
SpecialistDoctors.description: Treats conditions related to bones, joints, ligaments, and muscles.

SpecialistDoctors.title: Oncologist
SpecialistDoctors.description: Specializes in diagnosing and treating cancer.
